record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, NOVEMBER 5, 2007, AT 2 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, NOVEMBER 5, 2007, AT 2 P.M. -- (Senate - November 02, 2007)

[Page: S13737]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, if there is no further business, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:20 p.m., adjourned until Monday, November 5, 2007, at 2 p.m.
